Forces

This section of the Epic rules includes datasheets for each of the armies, plus a reference sheet that groups all of the game tables together into one place. The following abbreviations are used on the datasheets:

AC
Aircraft
AV
Armoured Vehicle
(bc)
(base contact)
BP
Barrage Points
CC
Close Combat
CH
Character
D
Disrupt
DC
Damage Capacity
EA(+x)
Extra Attacks (+x)
FF
Firefight
FS
First Strike
FwA
Forward Fire Arc
FxF
Fixed Forward Fire Arc
GM
Guided Missile
IC
Ignore Cover
Ind
Indirect Fire
INF
Infantry
L
Lance
Left
Left Fire Arc
LV
Light Vehicle
MW
Macro-weapon
Right
Right Fire Arc
RrA
Rear Fire Arc
S
Sniper
SC
Spacecraft
Slw
Slow Firing
SS
Single Shot
TK(x)
Titan Killer (x)
WE
War Engine
